title: JSON schema for Azure Functions host.json files

functions.description: The list of functions the host should load.

functionTimeout.description: Value indicating the timeout duration for all functions.

watchDirectories.description: Set of shared code directories that should be monitored for changes to ensure that when code in these directories is changed, it is picked up by your functions

singleton.description: Configuration settings for Singleton lock behavior.

lockPeriod.description: The period that function level locks are taken for (they will auto renew).

listenerLockPeriod.description: The period that listener locks are taken for.

listenerLockRecoveryPollingInterval.description: The time interval used for listener lock recovery if a listener lock couldn't be acquired on startup.

lockAcquisitionTimeout.description: The maximum amount of time the runtime will try to acquire a lock.

lockAcquisitionPollingInterval.description: The interval between lock acquisition attempts.

defaultLevel.description: The default level for logging. If a category level is not specified, this value is used.

aggregator.description: Configuration settings for the function result aggregator.

batchSize.description: The maximum batch size for aggregations. If this value is reached before the 'flushTimeout', all values will be flushed.

flushTimeout.description: The aggregation duration. The aggregator will flush periodically based on this value.

fileLoggingMode.description: Value determining what level of file logging is enabled.

workersDirectory.description: Specifies full path of the directory for language workers

applicationInsights.description: Configuration settings for Application Insights logging.

sampling.description: Configuration settings for Application Insights client-side adaptive sampling.

isEnabled.description: If true, client-side adaptive sampling is enabled.

maxTelemetryItemsPerSecond.description: The target rate that the adaptive algorithm aims for on each instance

extensions.description: Configuration options for extensions installed on this host.

routePrefix.description: Defines the default route prefix that applies to all routes. Use an empty string to remove the prefix.

maxConcurrentRequests.description: Defines the the maximum number of http functions that will execute in parallel.

maxOutstandingRequests.description: Defines the maximum number of oustanding requests that will be held at any given time.

dynamicThrottlesEnabled.description: Indicates whether dynamic host counter checks should be enabled.

maxPollingInterval.description: The maximum interval in milliseconds between queue polls.

batchSize.description: The number of queue messages to retrieve and process in parallel (per job function).

maxDequeueCount.description: The number of times to try processing a message before moving it to the poison queue

newBatchThreshold.description: The threshold at which a new batch of messages will be fetched. The default is batchSize/2.

visibilityTimeout.description: The visibility timeout that will be applied to messages that fail processing.

prefetchCount.description: The default PrefetchCount that will be used by the underlying MessageReceiver.

messageHandlerOptions.description: The options that will be used for the message handler registered with the MessageReceiver.

maxConcurrentCalls.description: The maximum number of concurrent calls to the callback the message pump should initiate.

maxAutoRenewTimeout.description: The maximum duration within which the Service Bus message lock will be renewed automatically.

autoComplete.description: Value determining whether messages will be completed automatically, or whether the function will take responsibility message completion.

maxBatchSize.description: The maximum event count received per receive loop.

receiveTimeout.description: the timespan in which the user is willing to wait when the event processor is performing a receive operation.

enableReceiverRuntimeMetric.description: Value indicating whether the runtime metric of a receiver is enabled.

prefetchCount.description: The default PrefetchCount that will be used by the underlying EventProcessorHost.

invokeProcessorAfterReceiveTimeout.description: Value indicating whether the processor should be invoked after every ReceiveTimeout when there are no more messages in the stream for a partition.

batchCheckpointFrequency.description: The number of batches to process before creating an EventHub cursor checkpoint

hubName.description: The logical container for Azure Storage resources that are used for orchestrations.

azureStorageConnectionStringName.description: An app setting (or environment variable) with the storage connection string to be used by the orchestration/activity trigger.
